wikipedia_page.main: Mary Teresa Goudie, Baroness Goudie (née Brick; born 2 September 1946) is a Labour member of House of Lords of the United Kingdom. In 1998, she was made a life peer as Baroness Goudie, of Roundwood in the London Borough of Brent. She is on the board of Vital Voices and is involved in promoting gender equity with both the G8 and G20.

response: *  1946   – Mary Goudie, Baroness Goudie, English  humanitarian and politician
